Property.name: autoHide
Property.comment: True to automatically hide the tooltip after the mouse exits the target element or after the {@link #dismissDelay} has expired if set (defaults to true). If {@link closable} = true a close tool button will be rendered into the tooltip header.

Property.name: dismissDelay
Property.comment: Delay in milliseconds before the tooltip automatically hides (defaults to 5000). To disable automatic hiding, set dismissDelay = 0.

Property.name: hideDelay
Property.comment: Delay in milliseconds after the mouse exits the target element but before the tooltip actually hides (defaults to 200). Set to 0 for the tooltip to hide immediately.

Property.name: mouseOffset
Property.comment: An XY offset from the mouse position where the tooltip should be shown (defaults to [15,18]).

Property.name: showDelay
Property.comment: Delay in milliseconds before the tooltip displays after the mouse enters the target element (defaults to 500)

Property.name: target
Property.comment: The target HTMLElement, Ext.Element or id to associate with this tooltip.

Property.name: trackMouse
Property.comment: True to have the tooltip follow the mouse as it moves over the target element (defaults to false).
